player.no_player: There aren't any songs playing currently.
player.not_the_same_vc: You are not in the same voice channel as me!
player.no_user_found: You aren't in any available voice channels.

track.no_track: I couldn't find any tracks for your search query try to be more specific.
track.timeMaxed: I can't load this track, it's duration is longer than `{{Time}}`
track.queueMaxed: You can't add more than `{{length}}` tracks to the queue.

permissions.missing_speak_perms: I don't have permissions to `speak` in the voice channel you are in.
permissions.missing_connect_perms: I don't have permissions to `connect` to the voice channel you are in.

excludes.excluded: `{{cmd}}` is already in the exclude list.

errors.no_queue: There aren't any tracks in the queue yet.

playlist.queueMaxed: I can't load this playlist because it has `{{playlistLength}}` tracks and max queue tracks is `{{length}}` tracks.

filtering_Maxed_Queue.filter: There are `{{offTracks_Length}}` tracks out of `{{tracksLength}}` that have time longer than `{{Time}}`, either react with ✅ to filter them or ❎ to skip this playlist.
filtering_Maxed_Queue.unfilterable: `{{- playlistName}}` has `{{tracksLength}}` tracks, their duration is longer than `{{Time}}`

playlist.queuing_playlist: Importing playlist `{{- playlistName}}` with adding `{{playlistLength}}` tracks to the queue.

exclude.remove_excluded: Removed `{{cmd}}` from the exclu ding list.

djrole.set_djrole: Set the new DJRole to `{{- role}}` in this guild.
djrole.exists: `{{role}}` is already the djrole in this guild.

settings.newPrefix: Prefix set to `{{- new_prefix}}` in this guild.
